name: Rural house
description:
Rural house (Only Adults) with sustainability certificate, with private parking, garden with barbecue and spaces for relaxation. Outdoor salt water swimming pool. Equipped Bikeroom and maps with information. Spacious kitchen, very well equipped with fireplace/BBQ, oven, dishwasher, American refrigerator, coffee makers, and a large table. Two rooms with softwos and fireplace, a pool and board games. With seven rooms, equipped with sheets. All rooms with private bathroom, towels and amenities.

The space
Sta located in the heart of the Natural Park of the MontgrÃ­. Overlooking Cap of Begur and within walking distance of medieval villages and the sea.
Ideal for groups of friends, families, who want to relax and fun. We are in full nature and we have more and 15 hiking trails and bike.

Guest access
We have barbecue in the garden, area of picnic, park with swings, sandbank, toboggan... and farm animals.
We rent bicycles under request

name: Esta Libro
description:
Wonderful and comfortable villa with private (heated) pool in Calonge, Catalunya, Spain for 6 persons. The villa is situated in a hilly area and at 3 km from Sant Antoni de Calonge beach. The villa has 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and 1 guest toilet, spread over 2 levels. The vicinity of the beach, places to shop, sports activities and places to go out makes this a fine villa to celebrate your holidays with family or friends and even your pets. Interior of the villa

name: Fantastic large holiday home with pool for 8 people in Rosas
description:
This provincial villa in Roses is ideal for a family. It can accommodate 8 guests and has 4 bedrooms. It has a private swimming pool for you to enjoy the best of your holidays.If you plan to enjoy a day in the nature, the forest is only 100 m from the home. The closest restaurant is 400 m for you to try some local delicacies. If you run out of essentials, the supermarkets are only 400 m. The home is 5 km from the sea if you wish to spend a day by the bay.A private terrace or garden with garden furniture are in place for you to enjoy some outdoor times. You can cook an amazing meal in the well-equipped kitchen for you loved ones. This villa has fireplace, dishwasher, air conditioning and coffee machine for your convenience. The nearest airport in Girona - Costa Brava is 50 km. The guest can check in between 4-7 PM and checkout between 8-10 AM.

description:
This luxurious 5-bedroom villa is in Roses, Catalonia. It is ideal for families or small groups and can accommodate 10 people. This villa has a private swimming pool for you to have a relaxing holiday.Located closely to the forest in 100 m, this property is perfect for nature lovers. The villa is only 400 m from the supermarket and restaurants nearby. The sea is 5 km away if you wish to spend a day at the beach. A roofed terrace or private garden with garden furniture is in the ground floor where you can enjoy an evening with your dear ones. Fireplace and air conditioning are in place to make your stay, a comfortable one. name: Delux Villa in Vilacolum with Swimming Pool
description:
Located in Vilacolum, this lavish 3-bedroom villa can host 6 people comfortably. The swimming pool is perfect to take refreshing dips with your family and friends.



Chill out at the beach 7 km away and enjoy all the fun-filled activities going around. You can stock your pantry from supermarket at 2 km and try local delicacies from restaurants at 4 km. You can also experience the local culture from the town centre of Figueres,11 km away.



The heating and air-conditioning will keep you comfortable during any climate. Prepare delicious grilled barbecues on the terrace and relish it with your favourite beverage while relaxing on the garden furniture. Garden is fenced where your kids can play safely. Washer and Dryer in the laundry room shall help with the laundry services.



The nearest airport is 45 km away.



Check-in between 4 â 7 PM and check-out between 8 â 10 AM.
